Posts.Content: smend13 wrote: In November I found a lump in my left breast - I went and had a mammogram and the Radiologist came in and proceeded to tell me I do not have Cancer.  I had already had one lump removed the year before which turned out fine.  I did know that not all cancers could be detected by mammograms.  I proceeded to tell him that and I think I made him angry - he kept telling me that I do not have cancer - and I said that I wanted to know what the lump was.  He said it was not his job to know what the lump was, just to tell me it was not cancer - so I asked for the ultrasound.  He spent maybe 30 seconds on the ultrasound,repeating over and over that I do not have cancer - they took one picture and never even went to where the "lump" was.  I was crying terribly by the time I got out of there.  It was bad.  It took 3 weeks for me to call and complain and then 2 more for me to tell the Veterans hospital not to pay for the Ultrasound.  I went in today and my Doc found another lump, right above the other lump on the outer upper left part of my breast, and one of my nodes is all swollen right above there - she sent me right over to the surgeons to schedule a biopsy.  Has anyone ever had a lump right there on the top upper part of their left breast and then another lump appears a few weeks later like an 1/2 inch away and then a node is all swollen - I am ready to panic and a little angry that the radiologist was such a freak.  It was not a womens center and he was not a nice person.  I have been to many places that have great doctors but this guy made me feel guilty for wanting to know what was in my breast. If anyone out there has ever had that happen - one is peanut size - the new one is pea size and then the node is not in the arm pit - more like where the bra strap is - the same with both lumps - right in line with the strap - please let me know - could it be just a cyst?? he said the mammo would have shown cyst or fibroid or any of those - I am freaking out and nervous - i hope it is nothing - Thanks!!    Does breast cancer spread like that? up - not always in the breast?  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: wondering about lumps and nodes? smend13 dlb823
